job description:
Job Summary

The associate will be working directly under the VP of IT to manage the Enterprise Data Repository system and OAC reporting platform. Job duties include:
  • Working with Finance, Marketing and Operations teams to understand and document their business intelligence requirements
  • Creating tabular reports and visual dashboards in OAC to meet those requirements
  • Writing complex SQL queries to help with Operations teams’ research requests
Required Qualifications
  • Experience in Oracle BICS/ OAC business intelligence tool or similar tools
  • Should be comfortable writing complex SQL queries
  • Experience in developing reports and visualization dashboards.
Preferred Qualifications
  • Experience working with Sales and C-level management in creating reporting dashboards desired.
  • Domain Experience desired in Financial Industry (Asset Management)
  • provided by Dice
Oracle BICS, Finance, Marketing, OAC, SQL
